casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Zachery FRANKLIN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017

Alice Osedach, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 22, 166 A.3d 24 (2017), is denied.
